title: Tillie's Tale
description: Who is the mysterious ghosty haunting puppygirl Tillie? And why? George, the magical basset hound familiar is on the trail. NYT bestselling author, Faith Hunter, of the Jane Yellowrock Series, praises Mindy Mymudes' first book in this series, George Knows..."George drools and George rules. Buy this book."
author: Mindy Mymudes
